<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106952</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106952</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The News About the News</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Nachrichten über die Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les nouvelles au sujet des nouvelles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A notícia sobre a notícia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le notizie circa le notizie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ειδήσεις για τις ειδήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las noticias sobre las noticias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will invite students to explore how news shows are constructed and to assess the way a newscast prioritizes different categories of news.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion lädt Kursteilnehmer ein, zu 
erforschen, wie Nachrichten Erscheinen konstruiert werden und die 
Methode festzusetzen eine Nachrichtensendung unterschiedlichen 
Kategorien von Nachrichten gibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon invitera des étudiants à explorer 
comment des expositions de nouvelles sont construites et pour évaluer
la voie un bulletin d'informations donne la priorité à différentes 
catégories des nouvelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição convidará estudantes explorar como 
as mostras da notícia são construídas e para avaliar a maneira um 
newscast dá prioridade a categorias diferentes de notícias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione inviterà gli allievi ad esplorare 
come le esposizioni di notizie sono costruite e valutare il modo un 
newscast dà la priorità alle categorie differenti di notizie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα προσκαλέσει τους σπουδαστές για να 
εξερευνήσει πώς οι ειδήσεις εμφανίζουν κατασκευάζεται και για να 
αξιολογήσει τον τρόπο ένα newscast δίνει προτεραιότητα στις 
διαφορετικές κατηγορίες ειδήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección invitará a estudiantes que exploren
cómo se construyen las demostraciones de las noticias y evaluar la 
manera un newscast da la prioridad a diversas categorías de noticias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
